mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Jane C. Washington to John Augustine Washington, 1818 September 30
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Jane Charlotte Blackburn, 1786-1855
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Jane C. Washington at Wheatland to her husband John A. Washington II in Buffaloe discusses family matters; relates offer to him to purchase 800 acres of land. Autograph letter signed, 3 pages, with integral address panel and partial seal.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Elswyth Thane Beebe Collection of Washington Family Papers
